NonDrop.description: Primary Source: None, currently unobtainable in challenge leagues

itemTagDefinitions.//comment2: Drop source or common currency type tags

Breach.description: Drops from Breach Encounters and Rewards

Harbinger.description: Drops from Harbinger encounters and Rewards

Eldritch.description: Drops from Exarch and Eater influenced monsters or bosses

itemTagDefinitions.//comment3: tags for highly specific items to give them some tag and provide isHiddenByDefault

GemOutcome.description: Gives a Gem reward when turned in

CurrencyOutcome.description: Gives a Currency reward when turned in

UniqueOutcome.description: Gives a Unique item reward when turned in

SixLinkOutcome.description: Gives a Six-Link reward when turned in

MapOutcome.description: Gives a Map, Fragment or other similar reward when turned in

InfluencedOutcome.description: Gives an item that is influenced

//comment1: These item bonus info texts are displayed in the FilterBlade Customizer tierList hoverBoxes. The texts are separate for section, baseType and (optional) unique name. The structure is: section (e.g. Uniques, Currency, ...) -> 'items' -> baseType (e.g. Simple Robe) -> property 1: 'text' (string to be displayed for the entire baseType), property 2: 'items' -> uniqueName (e.g. Tabula Rasa) -> 'text' (string to be displayed just for this one specific unique).

Flesh Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Life modifiers on a ring or amulet

Neural Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Mana modifiers on a ring or amulet

Carapace Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Defence modifiers on a ring or amulet

Uul-Netol's Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Physical modifiers on a ring or amulet

Xoph's Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Fire modifiers on a ring or amulet

Tul's Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Cold modifiers on a ring or amulet

Esh's Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Lightning modifiers on a ring or amulet

Chayula's Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Chaos modifiers on a ring or amulet

Reaver Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Attack modifiers on a ring or amulet

Sibilant Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Caster modifiers on a ring or amulet

Skittering Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Speed modifiers on a ring or amulet

Adaptive Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Attribute modifiers on a ring or amulet

Burial Medallion.text: Brought to Dannig to refresh his vendor inventory

Exotic Coinage.text: Brought to Tujen to refresh his vendor inventory

Astragali.text: Brought to Gwennen to refresh her vendor inventory

Scrap Metal.text: Brought to Rog to refresh his vendor inventory

items.//comment1: some of those can techincally very rarely drop from mob that drops vendor price of the items

Regal Shard.text: A stack of 10 shards becomes a Regal Orb

Alchemy Shard.text: A stack of 10 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy

Chance Shard.text: A stack of 10 shards becomes an Orb of Chance

Artificer's Shard.text: A stack of 10 shards becomes an Artificer's Orb

Transmutation Shard.text: A stack of 10 shards becomes an Orb of Transmutation

Mirror of Kalandra.text: Creates a mirrored copy of an item

Divine Orb.text: Randomises the numeric values of the random modifiers on an item

Exalted Orb.text: Augments a rare item with a new random modifier

Orb of Annulment.text: Removes a random modifier from an item

Gemcutter's Prism.text: Improves the quality of a gem

Regal Orb.text: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item

Vaal Orb.text: Corrupts an item, modifying it unpredictably

Chaos Orb.text: Removes a random modifier and augments a Rare item with a new random modifier

Orb of Alchemy.text: Upgrades a Normal item to a Rare item with 4 modifiers

Glassblower's Bauble.text: Improves the quality of a flask

Orb of Chance.text: Unpredictably either upgrades a Normal item to Unique rarity or destroys it

Orb of Transmutation.text: Upgrades a Normal item to a Magic item with 1 modifier

Orb of Augmentation.text: Augments a magic item with a new random modifier

Blacksmith's Whetstone.text: Improves the quality of a martial weapon

Armourer's Scrap.text: Improves the quality of an armour

Arcanist's Etcher.text: Improves the quality of a wand, staff or sceptre

Lesser Jeweller's Orb.text: Adds a Support Gem Socket to a Skill Gem with 2 Support Gem Sockets

Greater Jeweller's Orb.text: Adds a Support Gem Socket to a Skill Gem with 3 Support Gem Sockets

Perfect Jeweller's Orb.text: Adds a Support Gem Socket to a Skill Gem with 4 Support Gem Sockets

Artificer's Orb.text: Adds a Rune Socket to a Martial Weapon or Armour

Bronze Key.text: Used to open Bronze Caches within the trial of the Sekhemas

Silver Key.text: Used to open Silver Caches within the trial of the Sekhemas

Gold Key.text: Used to open Gold Caches within the trial of the Sekhemas

Distilled Despair.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Disgust.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Envy.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Fear.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Greed.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Guilt.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Ire.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Isolation.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Paranoia.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Distilled Suffering.text: Can be combined with other Distilled Emotions to Instil Amulets with Notable Passive Skills or Waystones with Layers of Delirium

Simulacrum.text: Placed into a map device it opens up 6 portals to a 30 wave fight. Increasing in difficulty with each wave. Aquired by combining 300 Simulacrum Splinters

An Audience With The King.text: Grants access to the King in the Mists boss fight
